articles.title: Ludicrously, Ebay USA's Back To School sale includes 20% off this $999 LG OLED 240Hz gaming monitor - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Somehow, LG's 240Hz OLED gaming monitor, MSRP $999, is part of Ebay's Back To School sale, bringing it to an all-time low price of $718.
articles.content: When I was a kid growing up in rural New Mexico, I dreaded the first day of school. I had to give up whole days of biking in the desert with my brother and playing video games, sure, but the real pro… [+3076 chars]
